# HKFitzpatrickSkinType.II

**Case**

White skin that burns easily and tans minimally.

## Declaration

```swift
case II
```

## Constants

- **HKFitzpatrickSkinType.notSet**: Either the user’s skin type is not set, or the user has not granted your app permission to read the skin type.
- **HKFitzpatrickSkinType.I**: Pale white skin that always burns easily in the sun and never tans.
- **HKFitzpatrickSkinType.III**: White to light brown skin that burns moderately and tans uniformly.
- **HKFitzpatrickSkinType.IV**: Beige-olive, lightly tanned skin that burns minimally and tans moderately.
- **HKFitzpatrickSkinType.V**: Brown skin that rarely burns and tans profusely.
- **HKFitzpatrickSkinType.VI**: Dark brown to black skin that never burns and tans profusely.
